rounds.category: I MADE IT THROUGH THE REIGN

clues.text: For 164 years, 1610 to 1774, France was ruled by just 3 kings, all of this name
Franz Joseph got plenty of new clothes when he ruled Austria for 68 years with this loftier title than king

Averaging 23 years per reign, the last 5 Russian czars were named either Nicholas or this

rounds.text: Though shot in the chest, Teddy Roosevelt gave a 1912 speech saying, "it takes more than that to kill" one of these animals
